messages.message: Deprecated unsized bytesPlanes in basic DFD block. Since specification 2.0.4 bytesPlanes must be sized (non-zero) for supercompressed textures.
messages.details: DFD block #1 bytesPlanes0 in basic DFD block is 0 but for KTX_SS_ZSTD supercompressed textures, since specification 2.0.4, it must be non-zero.
